title: Mini Series - State v. Jonathan Irons – Episode 3 - Verballing
description:
June 22, 2020 / The Undisclosed team explores the verbal confession Jonathan Irons allegedly gave to Detective Michael Hanlen, an officer with a checkered history.

Episode scoring music by Blue Dot Sessions.

This episode was sponsored by Aura Frames and Betterhelp.
